text:
In October, anticipating #Covid19 #vaccine, Miltiadis Makris (@UniKent @EconUniKent) & @toxvaerd1 (@Cambridge_Uni), discussed how the anticipation of such innovations influences pre-innovation social distancing [Issue 56/Paper 1]#CovidEcon: https://t.co/zWQYFgtsEW
#CEPRin2020 https://t.co/Vdc9pagq0j
